prompts: Create a muscular fighting-type Pokemon with a strong build and a playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with distinctive yellow and brown colors.
Imagine a large, humanoid Pokemon that dominates the battlefield with its powerful arms and combat skills.
Design a robust Pokemon that thrives in various environments, showcasing its fighting prowess.
Give me a Pokemon that is both friendly and fierce, with unique features that highlight its fighting style.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon with an interesting color palette, capable of using powerful fighting moves.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a sumo wrestler, emphasizing its size and strength in combat.
